EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2014 - 2014.09.18.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Accelerate 2014. Go ahead and register!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate>
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 September 18, 2014 Hotel Intercontinental Vienna All-day Event
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-accelerate-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 – Off to Vienna!
Dear Tricentis Customers and Partners,
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 is closer than you think. Go ahead and register now!
Join us as we discuss the challenges confronting Global 5000 businesses, software testing for the next generation of apps, and other topics surrounding business innovation.
Sandeep Johri, CEO at Tricentis, will open Tricentis Accelerate 2014 by outlining Tricentis’ strategy and plans. Wolfgang Platz, Founder & Chief Product Officer, will share how Tricentis can enable your business to accelerate innovation, reduce risk, and improve your testing efficiency and effectiveness.
We’re looking forward to the keynote presentation from Caroline Carder, Head of Solution Testing, Bankwest Australia, who will be on hand to discuss “Breaking the Chains – Driving Innovation through Organisational Transformation.”
Aside from this, we’ll have presentations, round tables, and booths from experts in the field. This year’s hot topics include Test Automation for Next Gen Apps, Agile, Mobile Testing, Enterprise E2E Testing and Service Virtualization.
We hope you’ll stay for our evening event, including an informal dinner and social hour.
Register today, and stay tuned for the agenda. Register now <http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-accelerate-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>.
To learn more about the event, visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate>
We look forward to meeting you in person.
Best Regards,
Wolfgang Platz Founder & Chief Product Officer Tricentis
Franz Fuchsberger Co-Founder & Chief Sales Officer Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
